GxCellEditors

Class GxCellEditorSuggestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorAbstract
      • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorSuggestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GxCellEditorInterface

    public class GxCellEditorSuggestion
extends GxCellEditorAbstract
    A Suggestion/autocomplete cell editor. The suggestion cell editor is an input which gives the user a list of values (suggestions) to choose from while it types. The suggestion list can be resolved using a custom object which implements `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolverInterface` or extends `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolver` ex: 
    use ::BBjGridExWidget/GxCellEditors.bbj::GxCellEditorSuggestion

editor! = new GxCellEditorSuggestion("ANY_UNIQUE_ID", new CustomResolver())
editor!.setEmptyMessage("No data to display")

column! = grid!.getColumn("COLUMN_ID")
column!.setCellEditor(editor2!)
    See Also:
    to learn how to implement an resolver

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BBjNumber AllowCustomValues!
      When true , then input values which are not part of the suggestion list will be accepted , rejected otherwise
      BBjString EmptyMessage!
      The message that will be showed when there are no suggestions that match the entered value.
      BBjNumber Height!
      Setup the suggestion list height in pixels
      protected BBjString Id!
      A unique id for this editor The id is required to route events correctly from the server to the client
      BBjNumber MinLength!
      Specify the minimum length, when autocomplete should appear on the screen.
      BBjString Pattern!
      A regular expression that the input's value must match In order for the value to pass constraint validation
      BBjNumber Required!
      When true , then the input cannot be empty and a value is required to consider the input valid
      protected GxCellEditorSuggestionResolverInterface Resolver!
      A class which implements `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolverInterface` or extends `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolver` and which can resolver the suggestion list.
      BBjNumber ShowOnFocus!
      Displays suggestions on focus of the input element.
      BBjString SuggestionGroupTemplate!
      An HTML template to be used for rendering the suggestion groups ex:
      BBjString SuggestionItemTemplate!
      An HTML template to be used for rendering the suggestion items ex:
      BBjNumber SuppressSuggestionOnInvalidInput!
      When true , then the suggestion will not be triggered for invalid inputs
      BBjString Title!
      The input title , when set to null() or "default" then we use the browser's default title , other wise the value defined in this option
      BBjNumber Width!
      Setup the suggestion list width in pixels

      • Pattern!

        public BBjString Pattern!
        A regular expression that the input's value must match In order for the value to pass constraint validation

      • Title!

        public BBjString Title!
        The input title , when set to null() or "default" then we use the browser's default title , other wise the value defined in this option

      • Required!

        public BBjNumber Required!
        When true , then the input cannot be empty and a value is required to consider the input valid

      • AllowCustomValues!

        public BBjNumber AllowCustomValues!
        When true , then input values which are not part of the suggestion list will be accepted , rejected otherwise

      • Height!

        public BBjNumber Height!
        Setup the suggestion list height in pixels

      • SuppressSuggestionOnInvalidInput!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSuggestionOnInvalidInput!
        When true , then the suggestion will not be triggered for invalid inputs

      • SuggestionItemTemplate!

        public BBjString SuggestionItemTemplate!
        An HTML template to be used for rendering the suggestion items ex: 
        template! = "
        <% = item.label %> - <% = item.value %> - <% = item.group %>
        "
editor!.setSuggestionItemTemplate(template!)

      • SuggestionGroupTemplate!

        public BBjString SuggestionGroupTemplate!
        An HTML template to be used for rendering the suggestion groups ex: 
        template! = "
        <% = groupName %>
        "
editor!.setSuggestionItemTemplate(template!)

      • EmptyMessage!

        public BBjString EmptyMessage!
        The message that will be showed when there are no suggestions that match the entered value.

      • MinLength!

        public BBjNumber MinLength!
        Specify the minimum length, when autocomplete should appear on the screen.

      • ShowOnFocus!

        public BBjNumber ShowOnFocus!
        Displays suggestions on focus of the input element. Note that if true, the `MinLength` option will be ignored and it will always call the resolver.

      • Resolver!

        protected GxCellEditorSuggestionResolverInterface Resolver!
        A class which implements `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolverInterface` or extends `GxCellEditorSuggestionResolver` and which can resolver the suggestion list.

      • Id!

        protected BBjString Id!
        A unique id for this editor The id is required to route events correctly from the server to the client
